Bash(gh pr create --repo tscircuit/circuit-json-to-step --title "Fix missing rectangles by creating separate solids for each component" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- STEP format requires each solid to have its own closed, watertight boundary
- Previously all component triangles were merged into one `ClosedShell`/`ManifoldSolidBrep`, violating STEP constraints
- Now each component box is processed individually with its own solid and proper naming

## Test Results
- basics04: 3 solids \(board + R1 + C1\) - previously was 2 merged solids
- repro01: 5 solids - previously was 2 merged solids
- All 10 existing tests pass
- OCCT validation passes for all test cases

## Test plan
- [x] All existing tests pass
- [x] Verified solid count increased in component tests
- [x] STEP files validate with occt-import-js

Fixes #6

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.ai/code\)
EOF
\)")

## Summary
- STEP format requires each solid to have its own closed, watertight boundary

- Now each component box is processed individually with its own solid and proper naming

Bash(for org in xero sharesies halter serato soulMachines mattr-global rocketlab hnry-co auror pushpay)
Bash(do echo "=== $org ===" gh search repos "org:$org" --limit 3 --json name,stargazersCount)
